archimate:Capability.name: Service Test Quality Analysis
archimate:Capability.documentation: Service Test Quality Analysis manages a quality analysis on tests to continually tweak and improve it. Service Test Quality Analysis Management provides an offline analysis of the usage of the tests to determine its relevance and provides modifications proposal concerning all the Test specification (including: test method, quota, authorized users, consequences according to resultsâ€¦). This analysis is done using statistical test usage data to evaluate the tests relevance and the needed updates. Following the analysis, it can be decided to - Do nothing, - Propose the creation of additional service tests, - Propose the update of existing service tests, - Remove service tests that are considered irrelevant.
